)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := redshiftserverless.NewNamespace(ctx, "example", &redshiftserverless.NamespaceArgs{

		})

		}
		return nil
	})
}

## Namespace Resource Properties {#properties}

To learn more about resource properties and how to use them, see [Inputs and Outputs](/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs) in the Architecture and Concepts docs.

### Inputs

<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="python">
<p>
In Python, inputs that are objects can be passed either as <a href="/docs/languages-sdks/python/#inputs-and-outputs">argument classes or as dictionary literals</a>.
</p>
</pulumi-choosable>

The Namespace resource accepts the following [input](/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs) properties:



<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required property-replacement"
            title="Required">
        <span id="namespacename_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#namespacename_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Namespace<wbr>Name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The name of the namespace.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="adminpasswordsecretkmskeyid_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#adminpasswordsecretkmskeyid_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Admin<wbr>Password<wbr>Secret<wbr>Kms<wbr>Key<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>ID of the KMS key used to encrypt the namespace's admin credentials secret.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="adminuserpassword_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#adminuserpassword_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Admin<wbr>User<wbr>Password</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The password of the administrator for the first database created in the namespace.
Conflicts with <code>manage_admin_password</code> and <code>admin_user_password_wo</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="adminusername_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#adminusername_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Admin<wbr>Username</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The username of the administrator for the first database created in the namespace.</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="dbname_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#dbname_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Db<wbr>Name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The name of the first database created in the namespace.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="defaultiamrolearn_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#defaultiamrolearn_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Default<wbr>Iam<wbr>Role<wbr>Arn</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role to set as a default in the namespace. When specifying <code>default_iam_role_arn</code>, it also must be part of <code>iam_roles</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="iamroles_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#iamroles_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Iam<wbr>Roles</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">List&lt;string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A list of IAM roles to associate with the namespace.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="kmskeyid_csharp">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#kmskeyid_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Kms<wbr>Key<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The ARN of the Amazon Web Services Key Management Service key used to encrypt your data.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="logexports_csharp">

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">List&lt;string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The types of logs the namespace can export. Available export types are <code>userlog</code>, <code>connectionlog</code>, and <code>useractivitylog</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="manageadminpassword_csharp">

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Whether to use AWS SecretManager to manage namespace's admin credentials.

            title="Optional">

        <span class="property-type">Dictionary&lt;string, string&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A map of tags to assign to the resource. If configured with a provider <code>default_tags</code> configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.</dd></dl>

    <dd>The name of the namespace.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="adminpasswordsecretkmskeyid_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#adminpasswordsecretkmskeyid_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">admin<wbr>Password<wbr>Secret<wbr>Kms<wbr>Key<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>ID of the KMS key used to encrypt the namespace's admin credentials secret.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="adminuserpassword_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#adminuserpassword_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">admin<wbr>User<wbr>Password</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The password of the administrator for the first database created in the namespace.
Conflicts with <code>manage_admin_password</code> and <code>admin_user_password_wo</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="adminusername_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#adminusername_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">admin<wbr>Username</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The username of the administrator for the first database created in the namespace.</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="dbname_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#dbname_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">db<wbr>Name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The name of the first database created in the namespace.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="defaultiamrolearn_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#defaultiamrolearn_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">default<wbr>Iam<wbr>Role<wbr>Arn</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role to set as a default in the namespace. When specifying <code>default_iam_role_arn</code>, it also must be part of <code>iam_roles</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="iamroles_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#iamroles_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">iam<wbr>Roles</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">List&lt;String&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A list of IAM roles to associate with the namespace.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="kmskeyid_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#kmskeyid_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">kms<wbr>Key<wbr>Id</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The ARN of the Amazon Web Services Key Management Service key used to encrypt your data.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="logexports_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#logexports_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">log<wbr>Exports</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">List&lt;String&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The types of logs the namespace can export. Available export types are <code>userlog</code>, <code>connectionlog</code>, and <code>useractivitylog</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="manageadminpassword_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#manageadminpassword_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">manage<wbr>Admin<wbr>Password</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Boolean</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Whether to use AWS SecretManager to manage namespace's admin credentials.
Conflicts with <code>admin_user_password</code> and <code>admin_user_password_wo</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="tags_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#tags_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">tags</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Map&lt;String&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A map of tags to assign to the resource. If configured with a provider <code>default_tags</code> configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

## Look up Existing Namespace Resource {#look-up}

Get an existing Namespace resource's state with the given name, ID, and optional extra properties used to qualify the lookup.
<div>
<pulumi-chooser type="language" options="csharp,go,typescript,python,yaml,java"></pulumi-chooser>
</div>

<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="javascript,typescript">

        <span class="nx">admin_user_password</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="nx">Optional[str]</span> = None<span class="p">,</span>

            title="Optional">

</span>

            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_iamroles_csharp">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">bool</span>

            title="Optional">

            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_arn_yaml">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Redshift Serverless Namespace.</dd><dt class="property-optional property-replacement"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_dbname_yaml">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The name of the first database created in the namespace.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_defaultiamrolearn_yaml">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role to set as a default in the namespace. When specifying <code>default_iam_role_arn</code>, it also must be part of <code>iam_roles</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_iamroles_yaml">

        <span class="property-type">List&lt;String&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>A list of IAM roles to associate with the namespace.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_kmskeyid_yaml">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">List&lt;String&gt;</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>The types of logs the namespace can export. Available export types are <code>userlog</code>, <code>connectionlog</code>, and <code>useractivitylog</code>.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_manageadminpassword_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#state_manageadminpassword_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">manage<wbr>Admin<wbr>Password</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">Boolean</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Whether to use AWS SecretManager to manage namespace's admin credentials.

        <span id="state_namespaceid_yaml">

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>

    </dt>
    <dd>The name of the namespace.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

## Import



Using `pulumi import`, import Redshift Serverless Namespaces using the `namespace_name`. For example:

```sh
$ pulumi import aws:redshiftserverless/namespace:Namespace example example
```


To learn more about importing existing cloud resources, see [Importing resources](/docs/using-pulumi/adopting-pulumi/import/).
